com.hds.hcpaw.fss.api

Class AnywhereActivityAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hds.hcpaw.fss.api.AnywhereActivityAPI

  • public class AnywhereActivityAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    API for performing activity-related actions such as getting files activity. These methods are implemented using the HCP Anywhere FSS API /fss/public/activity URIs.

    See the method AnywhereAPI.getActivityAPI() to obtain an instance of the AnywhereActivityAPI.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description

    • Method Detail

      • getFilesActivity

        public FilesActivity getFilesActivity(AuthToken authToken,
                                      FilesActivityRequest.FilesActivityType activityType,
                                      java.lang.String fsId,
                                      java.lang.String pageToken,
                                      java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                      PageAction pageAction,
                                      java.lang.String language)
                               throws AwUnsupportedApiVersionException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      AnywhereException
        Get files activity of a filesystem
        Parameters:
        authToken - authentication token for the user performing the request
        activityType - Type of file activity, must be either MODIFY, READ_LINK, or READ
        fsId - Filesystem ID
        pageToken - Token returned in last call to this API, or null
        pageSize - Maximum number of entries to return
        pageAction - Action to perform for this request (FIRST, LAST, NEXT, PREV)
        language - Locale in which activity strings should be returned
        Returns:
        Files activity
        Throws:
        AwUnsupportedApiVersionException
        java.io.IOException
        AnywhereException

      • getCollaborationActivity

        public CollaborationActivity getCollaborationActivity(AuthToken authToken,
                                                      CollaborationActivityRequest.CollaborationActivityType activityType,
                                                      java.lang.String pageToken,
                                                      java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                      PageAction pageAction,
                                                      java.lang.String language)
                                               throws AwUnsupportedApiVersionException,
                                                      java.io.IOException,
                                                      AnywhereException
        Get collaboration activity
        Parameters:
        authToken - authentication token for the user performing the request
        activityType - Type of collaboration activity, must be either SHARE, LINK, or TEAM_MANAGEMENT
        pageToken - Token returned in last call to this API, or null
        pageSize - Maximum number of entries to return
        pageAction - Action to perform for this request (FIRST, LAST, NEXT, PREV)
        language - Locale in which activity strings should be returned
        Returns:
        Collaboration activity
        Throws:
        AwUnsupportedApiVersionException
        java.io.IOException
        AnywhereException
